Warwick.Brewer Cove Haven Marina:
Brewer Cove Haven Marina is a marina located in Barrington, Rhode Island on Narragansett Bay.


== Description ==
Brewer Cove Haven Marina is located in Barrington, on Bullock Cove, at the head of Narragansett Bay. Barrington is 9 miles (14 km) southeast of Providence and 25 miles (40 km) from Block Island.
